results.title: Simvastatin promotes neurite outgrowth in the presence of inhibitory molecules found in central nervous system injury.

results.title: Statins decrease chondroitin sulfate proteoglycan expression and acute astrocyte activation in central nervous system injury.
results.text_hl: The numerous beneficial effects of statins on @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@CNS injury@@@ render them an attractive candidate in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@CNS injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Holmberg E, Zhang SX, Sarmiere PD, Kluge BR, White JT, Doolen S. Statins decrease chondroitin sulfate proteoglycan expression and acute astrocyte activation in central nervous system injury. Exp Neurol. 2008 Nov;214(1):78-86. PMID: 18722369

results.title: Anti-inflammatory Therapy With Simvastatin Improves Neuroinflammation and CNS Function in a Mouse Model of Metachromatic Leukodystrophy.
results.text_hl: Anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ Therapy With @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Improves @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@Neuroinflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@CNS@@@ Function in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mouse@@@ Model of @DISEASE_Leukodystrophy_Metachromatic @DISEASE_MESH:D007966 @@@Metachromatic Leukodystrophy@@@.

results.title: Statins' immunomodulatory potential against Th17 cell-mediated autoimmune response.
results.text_hl: In addition to the statin-mediated effect on the monocyte cytokine production, which regulates Th17 cell differentiation, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ directly inhibits @GENE_IL17A @GENE_3605 @@@IL-17@@@ production in @GENE_CD4 @GENE_920 @@@CD4@@@+ cells, which may collectively inhibit the @DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune@@@ response in @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS@@@), a @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@central nervous system@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@CNS@@@) @DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@inflammatory demyelinating disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang X, Markovic-Plese S. Statins' immunomodulatory potential against Th17 cell-mediated autoimmune response. Immunol Res. 2008;41(3):165-74. PMID: 18484192
citations.BibTeX: @article{18484192, title={Statins' immunomodulatory potential against Th17 cell-mediated autoimmune response.}, author={Zhang X and Markovic-Plese S}, journal={Immunol Res}, volume={41}, number={3}, pages={165-74}}

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits IFN regulatory factor 4 expression and Th17 cell differentiation in CD4+ T cells derived from patients with multiple sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Subsequent to the clinical trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Relapsing_Remitting @DISEASE_MESH:D020529 @@@relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Relapsing_Remitting @DISEASE_MESH:D020529 @@@RR MS@@@), which demonstrated the ability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to inhibit new @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@CNS lesion@@@ formation, the current in vitro study has characterized the mechanisms through which @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibits Th17 cell differentiation.

citations.NLM: Zhang X, Tao Y, Troiani L, Markovic-Plese S. Simvastatin inhibits IFN regulatory factor 4 expression and Th17 cell differentiation in CD4+ T cells derived from patients with multiple sclerosis. J Immunol. 2011 Sep 15;187(6):3431-7. PMID: 21856936
citations.BibTeX: @article{21856936, title={Simvastatin inhibits IFN regulatory factor 4 expression and Th17 cell differentiation in CD4+ T cells derived from patients with multiple sclerosis.}, author={Zhang X and Tao Y and Troiani L and Markovic-Plese S}, journal={J Immunol}, volume={187}, number={6}, pages={3431-7}}
